quote: A sense of the universe, a sense of the all, the nostalgia which seizes us when confronted by nature, beauty, music - these seem to be an expectation and awareness of a Great Presence.
quote_letters: A SENSE OF THE UNIVERSE A SENSE OF THE ALL THE NOSTALGIA WHICH SEIZES US WHEN CONFRONTED BY NATURE BEAUTY MUSIC - THESE SEEM TO BE AN EXPECTATION AND AWARENESS OF A GREAT PRESENCE
